April 11, 2009, Hugo worked with Douglas in the same group

For the past six months, I have worked with Hugo Vasquez in the Operations and Support area for our software product line. During that time, I have found Hugo to be a dedicated and conscientious team member who balances supporting external customers with many other internal requirements of the position - and does it well. He is a very bright individual, effective, professionally courteous and passionate about his work. Over the past two months, Hugo has assumed an additional duty as a technical reviewer for knowledge base content. This has been very helpful to me in my work as knowledge management lead because I always know that I can count on him to do good work in a timely fashion. In general, Hugo is a pleasure to work with. I highly recommend him for any new project he pursues going forward.Doug UngerApril, 2009

Linda Hall
Branch Manager, Loan Originator at Skyline Financial Corp, NMLS# 12072
November 29, 2011, Hugo was a client of Linda’s

From the first day I started working with Linda, I could tell she had a genuine concern for me. For over a year she worked with me on cleaning up my credit and making sure I was in a good spot to get approved for the house I wanted. She even helped me fight a credit union that was claiming I hand't paid a loan, even though I had documents proving I did.  She advised me to not get a house bigger than I could afford and even made me evaluate if buying a house was the right choice.  I never felt like she was pressuring me to buy or looking out for anyone's interest other then mine. If I was ever in the market for another house, I would not work with anyone other than Linda.
